readable.title: 2074146683_7c83167aa1
readable.content: A man in a white hat uses money to obscure the face of the baby in his baby carrier . A woman in a white hat holding money and her bags . A woman juggles her baby , purse , money and food from a market . A woman wearing a white hat and carrying a baby , a grocery bag , and a blue tote bag , sorts her money . A woman wearing a white hat is carrying a baby whilst shopping in a market for groceries .
